faction_profile.name: 화산파 (Mount Hua Sect / 華山派)
alias: Leader of the Five Sacred Mountain Sword Sects (오악검파의 맹주)

location.mountain: Mt. Hua (화산 / 華山) - Specifically the Lotus Peak (Yeonhwa-bong / 蓮花峰) at the summit.
location.geography: Extremely precipitous granite peaks. Known for dangerous cliffs and narrow paths like 'Changryong-ryeong' (Blue Dragon Ridge).
landmarks: West Peak (Seo-bong) / Lotus Peak (Yeonhwa-bong) - Main base.
East Peak (Dong-bong) / Chaoyang Peak - Best sunrise view.
Jade Maiden Cave (Oknyeo-seoksil / 옥녀석실) - Hidden training ground.
Blue Dragon Ridge (Changryong-ryeong) - 1m wide staircase ridge used for training balance.

heritage.founder: Hao Datong (Wang Chongyang's disciple) / 'Hak-seung' (Real name), 'Yeon-yeon-ja' (Taoist name).
heritage.symbol: Plum Blossom (Mae-hwa / 梅花). Represents resilience in winter and breathtaking beauty.

status.specialty: Sword Arts (Geom). Often called the 'Sword Sect of Mount Hua' (Hwasan Geom-pa).
status.reputation: Known for the most beautiful and sharp sword arts. Home to the 'Plum Blossom Swordsmen' (Maehwa-geomsu).

combat_style.visuals: Sword Qi manifests as scattering plum blossoms (pink/red aura).
core_concepts: Mae-hwa (Plum Blossom): Beauty concealing deadly sharpness.
Gi (Strange/Unique) & Heom (Dangerous/Steep): Reflecting the treacherous terrain of Mt. Hua.
combat_style.tactics: Overwhelming the enemy with a dazzling flurry of sword strikes that look like flower petals.

elite_unit.name: 매화검수 (Plum Blossom Swordsman / Maehwa-geomsu)
elite_unit.description: The elite disciples of Mt. Hua. They wear plum blossom embroidered robes or tassels.
elite_unit.significance: A status symbol. The Sect Leader is always chosen from among them.

signature_ultimate.name: 이십사수매화검법 (24-Style Plum Blossom Sword Art)
signature_ultimate.description: The most iconic art. Unfolds sword qi like blooming plum flowers.
variations: 설중암향부동매화검법 (Plum Scent in Snow Unfrozen Sword) - High-level art.
십방매화검진 (Ten Direction Plum Blossom Sword Formation)

list: 자하검 (Purple Mist Sword) - Associated with 'Violet Mist Divine Art'.
광풍쾌검 (Mad Wind Fast Sword) - Extremely fast and aggressive.

list.name: 자하신공 (Violet Mist Divine Art / Purple Haze Divine Art)
list.grade: Supreme (Sect Leader only). Manifests purple qi on the face/skin.

list: 암향표 (Dark Scent Drifting) - Moving like a drifting scent.

narrative_role: The Protagonist's Sect (Most popular choice in Korean Wuxia).
A sect that has fallen and needs restoring (The 'Return of the Mount Hua Sect' trope).
The most 'Visual' sect, perfect for describing beautiful combat scenes.
Rivals to Wudang (Sword vs Sword, Taoist vs Taoist).
